oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren in Tokyo - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of an AFRS appearance by Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren including Ramona Jones and Mary Klick, with host Connie B. Gay and announcer Rusty Knight. Part of Connie B. Gay's March 1951 tour to Japan and Korea. Also features an announcement from Edward S. Stephenson, the Entertainment Director for Special Services GHQ.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Grandpa Jones; Ramona Jones; Mary Klick; Grandchildren
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Rusty Knight) -- Rusty Knight introduces Connie B. Gay -- Connie B. Gay introduces Grandpa Jones -- Comedy routine (Grandpa Jones) -- Good Old Mountain Dew (Grandpa Jones) -- Grandpa Jones introduces 'Little Ramona' -- Orange Blossom Special (Ramona Jones, Grandpa Jones) -- Connie B. Gay introduces Rusty Knight -- Rusty Knight interviews Ramona Jones, Mary Klick, and Grandpa Jones -- Connie B. Gay introduces Grandpa Jones -- Come And Dine (Grandpa Jones, Ramona Jones) -- Grandpa Jones introduces Mary Klick -- Just Let Me Know (Mary Klick)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Gay, Connie B. (Connie Barriot), 1914-1989; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Klick, Mary (Singer)
